title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user); runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting, listing, pulling models; completions via rustyline.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Lightweight Alpine-based Docker image with CUDA support and multi-arch builds.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, model management, and streaming via IAsyncEnumerable.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Starter template for Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within your notes.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for Ollama with automatic GPU driver selection.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper that adds JWT auth, request logging, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints to Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; provides strongly-typed chat, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for macOS/iOS apps wanting to talk to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into threads with slash commands.
